dn4:23.4: “It’s when a Realized One arises in the world, perfected, a fully awakened Buddha …
dn4:23.5: That’s how a mendicant is accomplished in ethics.
dn4:23.6: This, brahmin, is that ethical conduct. …
dn4:23.7: They enter and remain in the first absorption …
dn4:23.11: They project and extend the mind toward knowledge and vision …
dn4:23.13: They understand: ‘… there is nothing further for this place.’
